name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Soutenroku with Power-Up Kit
overview: Nobunaga no Yabō: Sōtenroku (信長の野望・蒼天録; Nobunaga's Ambition: Record of Blue Skies) is the tenth title in the Nobunaga no Yabou series. This game returned to castle-taking battles. It also became possible to play as a castle lord as well as a Daimyō.
